mapper.update: update USER SET status = 1, delete_dt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into USER(password, email, nickname, auth, status, google_key, kakao_key, naver_key) values (#{password}, #{email}, #{nickname}, 1, 0, #{googleKey}, #{kakaoKey}, #{naverKey})
mapper.select: select F.file_id, F.file_name, F.sys_file_name as uniqueFileName, UFM.user_id from FILE F INNER JOIN USER_FILE_MAPPING UFM on F.file_id = UFM.file_id where UFM.user_id = #{userId}
